synopsis.text: Corporation Teiai's high-ranking executive, Yukio Tonegawa, serves as the trusted aide to the formidable chairman, Kazutaka Hyoudou. Tasked with the daunting challenge of orchestrating a sinister 'game of death,' Tonegawa must rally his team to satisfy their unpredictable boss' whims. As Tonegawa navigates the tumultuous world of corporate scheming and backstabbing, he discovers unexpected joy in his new role. This darkly comedic spin-off of the popular Kaiji series offers a fresh perspective on the high-stakes challenges faced by Tonegawa and his team, as they strive to keep their demanding chairman happy and maintain their positions within the company.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
